# Agent Gateway - API Registry for the Agent Economy
# This file helps AI agents and LLMs discover and use this service

## What is Agent Gateway?
Agent Gateway is an API registry and router for AI agents. It helps agents:
- Discover APIs by capability (research, market-data, image-gen, etc.)
- Route to the best provider based on quality, latency, and price
- Register new APIs to join the marketplace

## Base URL
https://agent-gateway-zeta.vercel.app

## Endpoints for Agents

### 1. List All APIs
GET /api/v1/registry
Returns: JSON list of all active APIs with capabilities, pricing, and metrics

### 2. Search APIs with Filters
GET /api/v1/registry?category=research&minQuality=4.0&maxPrice=0.01
Filters: category, minQuality, maxPrice, capabilities, sortBy

### 3. Get Single API by ID
GET /api/v1/registry/{id}
Returns: Full details of a specific API

### 4. Smart Routing - Find Best Provider
POST /api/v1/route
Body: { "capability": "research", "preferences": { "max_latency_ms": 3000 } }
Returns: The best API provider for your capability needs

### 5. List All Capabilities
GET /api/v1/capabilities
Returns: All available capabilities with provider counts

### 6. Register New API
POST /api/registry/register
Body: { "name": "...", "endpoint": "...", "category": "...", "pricing": {...} }
Returns: Registration confirmation (status: pending review)

## Response Format
All responses use JSON-LD with @context: https://apipool.dev/schema/v1

## Example Usage (for agents)

To find a research API:
```
curl https://agent-gateway-zeta.vercel.app/api/v1/route \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"capability": "research", "preferences": {"min_quality_score": 4.0}}'
```

## Categories
- research: Deep research and analysis
- market-data: Financial and prediction market data
- image-gen: Image generation
- code: Code generation and analysis
- translation: Language translation
- summarization: Text summarization
- embeddings: Vector embeddings
- web-scraping: Web data extraction
- audio: Audio processing
- video: Video processing
- other: Everything else

## Pricing Models
- free: No cost, may have rate limits
- per_request: Pay per API call
- subscription: Monthly flat fee
- x402: HTTP 402 micropayments

## A2A Protocol
This registry supports Google's Agent-to-Agent protocol.
Agent cards available at: /.well-known/agent-card.json

## For API Providers
Register your API to be discovered by AI agents worldwide.
Quality scoring is automated based on uptime, latency, and success rate.
Higher quality = more routing priority.
